meanings.definition: A person who is annoying or bothersome.
meanings.sent1: The nudnik kept talking loudly during the movie.
meanings.sent2: My little brother can be a nudnik when he wants attention.
meanings.sent3: The nudnik at the party wouldn't stop telling the same joke over and over.
meanings.sent4: Her constant complaints made her the office nudnik.
meanings.sent5: The persistent nudnik finally convinced everyone to go to the beach.

meanings.sent1: Please don't nudnik me while I'm trying to concentrate.
meanings.sent2: The buzzing mosquito continued to nudnik me all night.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy nudniked the cat until she finally played with him.
meanings.sent4: The dripping faucet nudniked her into calling the plumber.
meanings.sent5: The persistent salesperson tried to nudnik her into buying the product.
